articles.title: Nobel chemistry prize 2024 goes to protein pioneers Baker, Hassabis and Jumper - Reuters
articles.description: U.S. scientists David Baker and John Jumper and Briton Demis Hassabis won the 2024 Nobel Prize in Chemistry on Wednesday for work on decoding the structure of proteins and creating new ones, yielding advances in areas such as drug development.
